    • Method Detail

      • createCatalog

        Page createCatalog(Page blueprint,
                   java.lang.String destinationPath,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String... rolloutConfigPaths)
            throws WCMException,
                   RepositoryException
        Create a product catalog from a catalog blueprint.
        Parameters:
        blueprint -
        destinationPath -
        name - the node-name of the root page
        title - the jcr:title of the root page
        rolloutConfigPaths - a list of rollout configs to use for the template <-> page MSM relationships
        Returns:
        the root page of the catalog
        Throws:
        WCMException
        RepositoryException

      • getTargetPaths

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTargetPaths(Page section)
        Return a list of target sections.
        Parameters:
        section - the master section (in the catalog blueprint)
        Returns:
        a List of paths to target sections created from the given master

      • rolloutChanges

        void rolloutChanges(Page master,
                    Page target,
                    boolean reset)
             throws WCMException,
                    RepositoryException
        Roll-out any changes for a product catalog or product catalog section.
        Parameters:
        master - the catalog/section blueprint from which to perform the rollout
        target - the catalog/section page (generated from the blueprint) which should be updated
        reset - true if overrides should be reset
        Throws:
        WCMException
        RepositoryException

      • convertToEditablePage

        void convertToEditablePage(Page pageProxy,
                           Page templatePage,
                           Product pimProduct)
                    throws WCMException,
                           RepositoryException
        Convert a product page proxy to a standard, editable page.
        Parameters:
        pageProxy - the proxy page to be converted
        templatePage - the template page reference to use for the editable page
        pimProduct - the product reference to use for the editable page
        Throws:
        WCMException
        RepositoryException

      • executePageRolloutHooks

        void executePageRolloutHooks(Page page,
                             boolean reset)
        Perform the catalog rollout hooks for a given catalog page. This includes: 1) applying any target properties from the blueprint 2) running any commerce-service-specific rollout hooks for the page
        Parameters:
        page -
        reset -

      • executeProductRolloutHooks

        void executeProductRolloutHooks(Resource productComponent)
        Perform the catalog rollout actions for a given product. This includes: 1) running any commerce-service-specific rollout hooks for the product
        Parameters:
        productComponent -

        Update a slave product component to reflect all its master's variations, images, etc.
